title: 2022 Midterm Election Debate: Joe Benning and David Zuckerman for lieutenant governor
description: Vermont Edition host Connor Cyrus moderates a debate with the candidates for Vermont lieutenant governor: Republican Joe Benning and Progressive/Democrat David Zuckerman.
